Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 25 Jul 2019I choose VWRD listed in UK stock exchange.Some would prefer IWDA + an Emerging Market ETF to cover global.There are many other Global index etf out there by different fund houses.0 comments0
